name: buffer version: 0.0.1 license: BSD3 copyright: Copyright (c) Don Stewart 2005-2009, (c) Duncan Coutts 2006-2009, (c) David Roundy 2003-2005. (c) Edward Kmett 2009-2010 maintainer: Edward Kmett stability: homepage: http://www.comonad.com/ package-url: description: A time and space-efficient implementation of byte vectors using packed Word8 arrays, suitable for high performance use, both in terms of large data quantities, or high speed requirements. Based on Data.ByteString and Data.FingerTree with minor additions to track the number of (potential) UTF8 multibyte tail bytes present in each given fragment and to break up fragments that include too many tail bytes to improve the asymptotics of splitting. category: Data author: Edward Kmett, Don Stewart, Duncan Coutts exposed: True exposed-modules: Data.Buffer.Word8 Data.Buffer.Unsafe Data.Buffer.Internal Data.Buffer.Lazy.Word8 Data.Buffer.Lazy.Internal Data.Buffer.Fusion hidden-modules: import-dirs: /home/ekmett/.cabal/lib/buffer-0.0.1/ghc-6.10.4 library-dirs: /home/ekmett/.cabal/lib/buffer-0.0.1/ghc-6.10.4 hs-libraries: HSbuffer-0.0.1 extra-libraries: extra-ghci-libraries: include-dirs: /home/ekmett/.cabal/lib/buffer-0.0.1/ghc-6.10.4/include includes: fpstring.h depends: base-4.1.0.0 ghc-prim-0.1.0.0 hugs-options: cc-options: ld-options: framework-dirs: frameworks: haddock-interfaces: /home/ekmett/.cabal/share/doc/buffer-0.0.1/html/buffer.haddock haddock-html: /home/ekmett/.cabal/share/doc/buffer-0.0.1/html
